job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: We are growing rapidly and we are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to help us analyze data and create and deploy tools utilizing both highlevel ML models and deep learning methods and approaches We leverage these tools to create bots that learn how to navigate and explore mobile apps These bots can be tuned to hunt for OS crashessoftware bugs check the app for usability issues or simply learn how to use the app like a normal human user would We are looking for creativethinking AI experts that can help us innovate the world of testing with the latest advances in AIbrbrJob ResponsibilitiesbrulliDesigning new classification models and augmenting classification features that can help improve our existing machine learning modelsliliDesigning and implementing data collection pipelinesliliModeling techniques and finetuning parameters for reinforcement learning agentsliliDesigning and developing servicebased MLAI platform to power the core platform as it scales to meet our rapidly growing customer baseliliKeeping up with the latest advancements in MLAI with frequent discussions and collaborationsbrliulJob RequirementsbrulliMS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or equivalent experience or PhD in a STEM fieldliliProficiency in Python including familiarity with Matplotlib NumPy pandas scikitlearn and TensorFlow or PyTorch librariesliliA vast knowledge of Machine Learning algorithms and the ability to apply them appropriately and in the correct contextslili3 years experience building large scale ML or data pipeline systemsliliAbility to balance priorities and execute projects to completion while either working alone or within a teambrliulNice to HavesbrulliExperience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS GCP or AzureliliExperience building deploying and monitoring services using a microservices architectureliliExperience in Quality Assurance as a tester QA engineer automation engineer or similar
